Name: Midnight Legends
About the game: Immerse yourself in a world filled with adrenaline racing and neon light, the metropolis of the future in the story-driven arcade race Midnight Legends! A game in which you can challenge the best street racers and show real driving skills. . - Win breathtaking races through the streets of the Midnight City. - Get away from police chases. - Buy and upgrade amazing cars of the future. - Try to defeat the City Legends and become the most famous racer in the history of Midnight Legends.
